SELECT COUNT(BIRTH) FROM CUSTOMER WHERE
(DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), "%Y" )-DATE_FORMAT(BIRTH, "%Y" )+1) < #{value} + 10 AND #{value} < (DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), "%Y" )-DATE_FORMAT(BIRTH, "%Y" )+1)
SELECT DISTINCT DATE_FORMAT(BSDATE, "%d" ) AS BSDATE FROM FEE ORDER BY BSDATE
SELECT IFNULL(SUM(FEE_AMNT),0) FROM FEE WHERE DATE_FORMAT(BSDATE, "%d" ) LIKE #{value}
SELECT IFNULL(SUM(FEE_AMNT),0) FROM FEE WHERE DATE_FORMAT(BSDATE, "%d" ) LIKE #{value} AND FEE_STAT_CD = '1'
SELECT IFNULL(SUM(FEE_AMNT),0) FROM FEE WHERE DATE_FORMAT(BSDATE, "%d" ) LIKE #{value} AND FEE_STAT_CD = '2'

SELECT A.BALANCE AS BALANCE, C.CNO, C.CEMAIL, C.CPWD , C.CNAME, C.ZIP, C.ADDR, C.DADDR, (DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), "%Y" )-DATE_FORMAT(C.BIRTH, "%Y" )+1) AS AGE, DATE_FORMAT(C.SDATE, "%Y/%m/%d") AS SDATE, C.CSTCD FROM ACCOUNT A, CUSTOMER C WHERE A.CEMAIL = C.CEMAIL
